channel.title: YIAN SHANG
channel.description: i have a project list that i'm slowly working through

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.

item.title: oslo - various
item.description:
Oslo is green. Oslo is expensive. It’s the land of $20 open-face sandwiches, lush, expansive natural spaces, and depressing statues of unhappy women.

materials: ink pen

item.title: san francisco transit speed map
item.description: This MUNI speed map is based on several weeks of GPS bus data curated from Nextbus. Click on a transit line below to see its speed-weighted route map and hover for its speed at that point. The current vehicles for the selected route(s) are also displayed. Built with Flask and jQuery.

item.title: berlin - victory column
item.description:
Victoria seems determined to fly away…

materials: ink pen, willpower in cold weather

item.title: berlin - nikolaikirche
item.description:
Everyone who spoke to me that day was a tourist. They were mostly looking for directions, and I felt obliged to provide some, despite being directionless and confused.

Someday I will have enough money to commission a building that looks exactly like this.

materials: ink pen, ability to speak to tourists in freezing weather

item.title: berlin - new identity
item.description:
I got tired of fielding questions about Trump…

materials: ink pen, pencil for shading

item.title: berlin - mysterious blimp
item.description:
A few weekends ago, the Ringbahn disintegrated into a fragmented mess, so I took a long walk around town. Somewhere along the way (smartphone snooping puts me not far from Viktoriapark), I came across this abandoned zeppelin/blimp/spaceship thing in a tiny park. A more adventurous soul would’ve crawled right into the middle of the spaceship, but alas, my space exploration days are behind me.

materials: tombow brush pens, aquarelle pencil, best eraser ever from grocery store

item.title: athens - food
item.description:
In Athens, I had daily dose of spanokopita and frappe.

We took a short day-trip to the island of Aegina and right before it was time for our return to Athens, I decided I absolutely had to have a gyro. If it weren’t for a slight snafu in the ship’s schedule, we would’ve missed the last boat off the island - all for my insatiable hunger!

item.title: about
item.description:
Born in the capital of Jiangsu province, raised in the Bay Area (generation 1.75?), and currently working in San Francisco. I like to build visualizations of interesting data. I also enjoy drawing, learning new languages, and minimalist cooking.

生在江苏，长在湾区，算是1.75代移民吧。我喜欢画画、学语言、简易烹饪和比较有趣的数据可视化。
